channel.title: Home on Francesco Tomaselli
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Francesco Tomaselli

item.title: Probabilistic to-visit Queue
item.description: A probabilistic collection leveraging Bloom Filters to store a set of 1 billion visited URLs in 18mb.

item.title: Search Engine in Rust
item.description: A search engine overview and Rust implementation, supporting free and boolean ranked queries, efficient disk and memory usage, and spelling correction.

item.title: Log-Structured Merge Tree
item.description: An LSM Tree overview and Java implementation, with a Skiplist, SStables, and background compaction from scratch.

item.title: About
item.description: I studied Computer Science from 2017 to 2022 at the University of Trento and Milan, and started working as a Software Engineer soon after. More recently, I moved to Berlin. Experience Amazon 07/24 - Now | Berlin Software Development Engineer II Satispay 01/23 - 06/24 | Milan Software Engineer Spaziodati 02/20 - 06/20 | Trento Software Engineer Intern Education University of Milan 2020 - 2022 Master’s degree in computer science
